00010 #ifndef __IM_FORMAT_H
00011 #define __IM_FORMAT_H
00012 
00013 
00014 class imFormat;
00015 
00016 /** \brief Image File Format Virtual Base Class (SDK Use Only) 
00017  * 
00018  * \par
00019  * Virtual Base class for file formats. All file formats inherit from this class.
00020  * \ingroup filesdk */
00021 class imFileFormatBase: public _imFile
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   const imFormat* iformat;
00025 
00026   imFileFormatBase(const imFormat* _iformat): iformat(_iformat) {}
00027   virtual ~imFileFormatBase() {}
00028 
00029   imAttribTable* AttribTable() {return (imAttribTable*)this->attrib_table;}
00030 
00031   /* Pure Virtual Methods. Every driver must implement all the following methods. */
00032 
00033   virtual int Open(const char* file_name) = 0; // Must initialize compression and image_count
00034   virtual int New(const char* file_name) = 0;
00035   virtual void Close() = 0;
00036   virtual void* Handle(int index) = 0;
00037   virtual int ReadImageInfo(int index) = 0;    // Should update compression
00038   virtual int ReadImageData(void* data) = 0;
00039   virtual int WriteImageInfo() = 0;            // Should update compression
00040   virtual int WriteImageData(void* data) = 0;  // Must update image_count
00041 };
00042 
00043 /** \brief Image File Format Descriptor Class (SDK Use Only) 
00044  * 
00045  * \par
00046  * All file formats must define these informations. They are stored by \ref imFormatRegister.
00047  * \ingroup filesdk */
00048 class imFormat
00049 {
00050 public:
00051   const char* format; 
00052   const char* desc;
00053   const char* ext;
00054   const char** comp;
00055   const char* extra;
00056   int comp_count, 
00057       can_sequence;
00058 
00059   virtual imFileFormatBase* Create() const = 0;
00060   virtual int CanWrite(const char* compression, int color_mode, int data_type) const = 0;
00061 
00062   imFormat(const char* _format, const char* _desc, const char* _ext, 
00063            const char** _comp, int _comp_count, int _can_sequence)
00064     :format(_format), desc(_desc), ext(_ext), comp(_comp), extra(""),
00065      comp_count(_comp_count), can_sequence(_can_sequence)
00066     {} 
00067   virtual ~imFormat() {}
00068 };
00069 
00070 extern "C"
00071 {
00072 
00073 /* Internal Use only */
00074 
00075 /* Opens a file with the respective format driver 
00076  * Uses the file extension to speed up the search for the format driver.
00077  * Used by "im_file.cpp" only. */
00078 imFileFormatBase* imFileFormatBaseOpen(const char* file_name, int *error);
00079 
00080 /* Opens a file with the given format
00081  * Used by "im_file.cpp" only. */
00082 imFileFormatBase* imFileFormatBaseOpenAs(const char* file_name, const char* format, int *error);
00083 
00084 /* Creates a file using the given format driver.
00085  * Used by "im_file.cpp" only. */
00086 imFileFormatBase* imFileFormatBaseNew(const char* file_name, const char* format, int *error);
00087 
00088 
00089 /* File Format SDK */
00090 
00091 /** Register a format driver.
00092  * \ingroup filesdk */
00093 void imFormatRegister(imFormat* iformat);
00094 
00095 
00096 }
00097 
00098 #endif
